_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Eight factors of a master thief who is s: He’s not skilled at hiding his booty.
Eight factors of a master thief who live: He doesn’t steal everything without exception.
He doesn’t rob the royal treasury.
He doesn’t work close to home.
He’s skilled at hiding his booty.
